properties.description: Somewhere safe and warm to meet up , have warm food, teas coffees, snacks. Play games, activities, chat, bring your own activities. Access to charging phones etc and to heating food . Advice and assistance around warmth and food poverty , isolation and wellbeing.
properties.title: The pantry warm Wednesdays
